9e0d6dd7-af51-4edc-b465-a802c0403589.name: Panic Attacks (Crippling, 3d minutes)
9e0d6dd7-af51-4edc-b465-a802c0403589.notes:
You have -4 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -6 to active
		defenses. You can't move from the spot, although you may cower (crouch).
		At the beginning of the attack, you lose 3 FP. At the end, the GM will
		immediately roll again to see if it triggers another attack!

d02ca2c7-0a5d-47e8-8c6f-12cc3c5b4ad7.name: Panic Attacks (Mild, 2d seconds)
d02ca2c7-0a5d-47e8-8c6f-12cc3c5b4ad7.notes: You have -2 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -4 to active defenses.

f3cccbfb-c766-4c1c-9863-1fc43ffd338e.name: Panic Attacks (Severe, 1d minutes)
f3cccbfb-c766-4c1c-9863-1fc43ffd338e.notes:
You have -3 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -5 to active
		defenses. You can't move from the spot unless you flee at full Move from it!
		At the beginning of the attack, you lose 2 FP.

modifiers.name: Reaction Bonus
modifiers.notes: Devotees of the old and beautiful.

modifiers.name: Alternate Benefit
modifiers.notes: Applies to science skills when used at lower TL

modifiers.name: Alternate Benefit
modifiers.notes: IQ-4+level to notice anything odd in an area you have lived 6-level months

modifiers.name: Reaction Bonus
modifiers.notes: Students of the arcane, gullible college students, and monster-hunters

modifiers.name: Alternate Benefit
modifiers.notes: Bonus to fright checks due to supenatural beings or sanity destroying tomes

modifiers.name: Alternate Benefit
modifiers.notes: Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
